Famous Work of Kim Jong Il Brought Out by Communist Party of Bolivia
articles.content:
Famous Work of Kim Jong Il Brought Out by Communist Party of Bolivia 
    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Famous work of leader Kim Jong Il "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in pamphlet by the Communist Party of Bolivia on December 29 last year. 
 Clarified in the work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), are the reason why preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is the basic principle to be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause and the tasks and ways of preserving the characters.

articles.title: DPRK to Remain True to Idea of Independence, Peace and Friendship
Korea's Reunification Based on June 15 Joint Declaration Supported
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Based on June 15 Joint Declaration Supported 
    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Ugandan organizations released a joint statement on Jan. 2 supporting the appeal made in the joint New Year editorial of the Workers' Party, army and youth league of Korea. The editorial calls for promoting national reunification on the principle of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and in line with the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a milestone for reunification agreed upon by the north and the south of Korea, under the slogan "Let us pave a wide avenue for independent reunification through national cooperation under the banner of our nation-first spirit!"
 The statement expressed support to the DPRK in its principled stand to peacefully settle the nuclear issue between the DPRK and the U.S. through dialogue and strongly demanded the Bush administration give up its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
